subject: Refactor claude.md with best practices and goal alignment
body:
- Reduce file size by 67% (1,285 â†’ 426 lines)
- Focus on architecture and patterns over implementation details
- Add AI-friendly structure with clear status indicators
- Include code examples showing key implementation patterns
- Document line number references for common tasks
- Emphasize core goal: multi-model revenue comparison
- Add troubleshooting section and common tasks guide
- Remove outdated content and completed TODO items
